sentences.sContent: We should take action to support the campaign.
sentences.sContent_eng: We should take action to support the campaign.
sentences.sCn: 我们应该采取行动来支持这个活动。

sentences.sContent: They invested time and energy in the election campaign.
sentences.sContent_eng: They invested time and energy in the election campaign.
sentences.sCn: 他们把时间和精力投入选举活动。

synos.tran: 作战；参加竞选；参加活动

phrases.pCn: 战役模式；完成任务模式

words.tran: 竞选者；从军者；出征者；老兵

trans.tranOther: to lead or take part in a series of actions intended to achieve a particular social or political result
